title: How can groups make good decisions? - Mariano Sigman and Dan Ariely

multiple-choice.question: What is the key to making good collective decisions, according to research?

options.label: A
options.text: Having a single leader make all the decisions.

options.label: B
options.text: Encouraging independent thinking within groups.

options.label: C
options.text: Ignoring the opinions of others and making decisions based on personal views.

options.label: D
options.text: Having a large number of people involved in the decision-making process.

options.label: B

options.text: The average answers became more accurate.
